title: Comment from Ranking Member Bennie G. Thompson

analysis.key_quote: The Proposed Rule would convert tens of thousands of career employees to at-will employees and return America to the past, where a Federal employee’s only qualification was loyalty to the President over the Constitution.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based hiring and protections for federal employees, emphasizing the risks of politicization and loss of due process rights.
